title: Beetroot soup
ingredients: ['1 large onion, chopped', '1 tbsp sunflower oil', '3 large beetroot, peeled and diced', '1 medium potato, peeled and diced', '1 litre vegetable stock', '1 tbsp vinegar', 'salt and pepper', 'small bunch of fresh dill, chopped', '100ml creme fraiche or soured cream']
